data.title: Grateful Dead Family Discography: Classic Soft Rock: Cool Night
data.text:
Classic Soft Rock: Cool Night

Various Artists

Initial release : 2006

Time Life

This compilation includes two tracks by Bruce Hornsby & The Range. Also includes a Santana track.

Tracks / Musicians

Cool Night - Paul Davis

Every Woman in the World - Air Supply

Mandolin Rain - Bruce Hornsby & the Range

Heart of Mine - Boz Scaggs

Everything Your Heart Desires - Hall & Oates

Broken Wings - Mister Mister

Nothing's Gonna Stop Us Now - Starship

Damn I Wish I Was Your Lover - Sophie B. Hawkins

Forever - Kenny Loggins

Don't Answer Me - Alan Parsons

Don't Bring Me Down - Electric Light Orchestra

Keep on Loving You - REO Speedwagon

Right Time of the Night - Jennifer Warner

Don't Cry Out Loud - Melissa Manchester

Where Are You Now? - Jimmy Harmen

Hold the Line - Toto

Black Magic Woman/Gypsy Queen - Santana

Evil Woman - Electric Light Orchestra

Lido Shuffle - Boz Scaggs

I'm Alright - Kenny Loggins

You Make My Dreams - Hall & Oates

65 Love Affair - Paul Davis

You Should Hear How She Talks About You - Melissa Manchester

Same Old Lang Syne - Dan Fogelberg

The One That You Love - Air Supply

Magnet and Steel - Walter Egan

As I Lay Me Down - Sophie B. Hawkins

Cry for Help - Rick Astley

Everytime You Go Away - Paul Young

The Way It Is - Bruce Hornsby & the Range

Kyrie - Mister Mister

Related releases

The Way It Is and Mandolin Rain were both originally released on;

The Way It Is, Bruce Hornsby and the Range, August 1986
